title: President Donald J. Trump’s Economic Agenda is Working for All Americans – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Economy & Jobs	

Issued on:
March 19, 2019
In just over two years since the election, we have launched an unprecedented economic boom.
						President Donald J. Trump					GROWING THE ECONOMY FOR ALL AMERICANS: The economy continued its historic boom in 2018, benefiting all Americans as job creation soared and wages rose. ROLLING BACK BURDENSOME REGULATIONS: The Trump Administration has rolled back business killing regulations to unleash an economic boom across all sectors of the economy.THE TAX CUTS ARE WORKING: The Tax Cuts and Jobs Act has spurred more business investment and put more money in the pockets of American workers.  Americans are better off today thanks to President Trump’s historic tax cuts.
